title: Come play 1 day of Clash on its road to relaunch

replies.body: its a test my god, its for whoever can make it riot doesnt revolve around your school night

All these kids thinking life revolves around their school nights.. Keep it on tuesday Riot, or consider a second ladder for weeknights. There's also a large amount of older people who find it difficult to do weekend nights.
I'm confused. On my League Client on the Clash tab it says Beta Cup June 3 - 5. In the post above it says this is just a 1 day thing? Clarification?
yeah, the messaging isn't as clear as it could be.  The Tournament is open for teams to be created (3rd) with the actual matches being on the 5th (1 day).

I truly hope I can win some ranked games just so I can get to Bronze 1 and participate in the Clash Event. Those rewards look good. 

{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

You got this! 

That said, you can be Bronze V and still play Clash, so don't stress!
Hey riot can i play with different people or do they have to be the same as friday saturday sunday?

Hey mate, you can start afresh with a new team.

Each Clash will be self-contained so you can choose a new team every time or rebuild your previous team – whatever floats your boat!
Are the rewards for the event planned for the weekend or the stress test on tuesday?
There will be rewards for participating in this beta test.
So with it matches as long as you have locked in your team you can start your games later(like 8:30)
All matches will start at 7:30 AEST with a 7 minute scouting phase, then it's straight into champ select. Teams must lock in between 7 and 7:30.
I have training that finishes 730 and I dont get home and ready to play till 8 are game mandatory to start at 730
Hi TylerMMG, unfortunately the lock in time is a hard deadline of 730 AEST for all teams. This is just a beta though, the full Clash event will start at a later date on a Friday night.

Guys this is beta testing on Tuesday, **not the actual event.** I believe that will be next Friday?
Edit: You also do not need a ticket for this.

That's correct! This is purely a test to see if we can get Clash off the ground this time. Once every region has confirmed that their test ran smoothly we'll launch with the full weekend schedule in OCE at a later date:

Friday: 7PM AEST
Saturday: 7PM AEST
Sunday: 4PM AEST
great, I'm not allowed to play on school nights and I'm busy Tuesday too. I hope the real thing is on a Friday

The full version of Clash will return on the Friday/Saturday/Sunday schedule. Sorry about the timing of this test, we needed to spin them up and get through them asap so it's on a rolling schedule of a beta in each region one after the other.
When is the next official clash? 8th？ or 15th？
Clash bugged again, won the clash game but we ended up losing in the bracket.
Is it possible in the future for the start time to be pushed back half an hour? A 5:30pm start of lock in would really make a difference for people in Western Australia :)
Clash is on at 9:40 Nz time which is quite annoying considering that its on a school night, oh well i hope it works this time.
just play bots like you usually do bro
school night? and i have things on tuesday please riot make it on the saturday or something then ill be able to play and enjoy your wonderful game even more.

When we're convinced Clash is solid (after we test) it will launch on Friday/Saturday/Sunday again! We just need to action this stress test ASAP hence the Tuesday night. Sorry you have to miss out Razzawood :(
...you really think a TUESDAY is the best day to have this? people do work and go to school you know.
cuz they know the server would be down if they chose the weekend.
underrated comment.
Riot game be cucking me, i be cucking my school teachers whomst place their expectation upon me{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
